main event: A witness observed a yellow balloon-shaped object that moved erratically through the sky and eventually disappeared on September 30, 1956.
interesting points: The object's initial size was estimated at 35 feet in diameter., The tail of the object broke up into flashes of light as it moved., The sighting lasted for approximately 35 minutes., The witness speculated that the object might have been caused by natural phenomena, possibly planet Mars., The report was filled out by civilian witnesses.
witness description: a civilian who observed the phenomenon
